figure_1.title: Fig. 1.
figure_1.caption: Five decades of AV research (Scopus data). APO: Annual publication output; CGR: Cumulative growth.

figure_2.title: Fig. 2.
figure_2.caption: Document citation network and thematic clusters. The size of each cluster is expressed in percentage of publications.

claims.sentence:
This trend can be observed in Fig. 1
, where Scopus data is used to show the annual production volume of peer-reviewed scientific outputs focusing on AV research.
As shown in Fig. 1, these five decades account for 18,153 publications, which were retrieved from the results of a keyword search.

Results
The network graph in Fig. 2
is a document citation network which shows how the AV research field is structured by considering the last five decades of scientific publication output and its main thematic research areas.
